== Wally ==
<nowiki>[[File:wally_logo_small.png]]</nowiki>

''Wally is a Lin/Mac/Win desktop wallpaper changer written using QT4.  Wally can use multiple sources like individual files, folders, FTP remote folders, and on-line services.

Supported Linux window managers are GNOME, KDE3, KDE4, XFCE4, BlackBox, FluxBox, Window Maker, and FVWM (experimental).''

Wally is a feature added alternative to Cortina, Drapes, and wallpaper-tray.

==== Supported On-Line Services ====
Flickr, Yahoo!, Panoramio, Pikeo, Ipernity, Photobucket, Buzznet, Picasa, Smugmug, Bing, Google, Vladstudio and deviantART.

== Installation ==
You can install from source, or from .debs located on the Official Wally Homepage, LaunchPad, FreshMeat, or SourceForge page listed below.

=== Uninstallation ===
If you installed using the the .deb method above, you can remove by using the following command.
<pre>
sudo apt-get remove wally
</pre>
